          <title>
            <string language="hu-HU">Lissajous görbék</string>
            <string language="en-US">Lissajous curves</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lissajous Kurven</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Courbes de Lissajous</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Curvas de Lissajous</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Curve di Lissajous</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Καμπύλες Lissajous</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Curvas de Lissajous</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu-HU</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu-HU">Lissajous görbék. Egymásra merőleges, különböző frekvenciájú rezgések összetevése.</string>
            <string language="en-US">Lissajous curves. Comparing vibrations of different frequencies being perpendicular to each other</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu-HU">fizika</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu-HU">elektromágnesesség</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu-HU">Lissajous görbe</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu-HU">frekvencia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu-HU">rezgés</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lissajous Kurven. Erschütterungen der 
unterschiedlichen Frequenzen miteinander vergleichen, die senkrecht 
sind</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Courbes de Lissajous. Comparant des 
vibrations de différentes fréquences étant perpendiculaires entre 
eux</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Curvas de Lissajous. Comparando vibrações 
das freqüências diferentes que são perpendiculares a se</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Curve di Lissajous. Confrontando le 
vibrazioni delle frequenze differenti che sono perpendicolari l'un 
l'altro</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Καμπύλες Lissajous. Συγκρίνοντας τις δονήσεις 
των διαφορετικών συχνοτήτων που είναι κάθετων η μια στην άλλη</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Curvas de Lissajous. Comparando vibraciones 
de diversas frecuencias que son perpendiculares el uno al otro</string>
          </description>
        </general>
